title: update xai API specification (2 changes)
body:
### New features

- **GET /v1/video-generation-models**: Introduces GET /v1/video-generation-models to list all video generation models available to the authenticated API key, returning full model metadata (id, fingerprint, created, owner, version, input/output modalities, aliases). Requires bearerAuth; returns 200 with a models array.
- **GET /v1/video-generation-models/{model_id}**: Introduces GET /v1/video-generation-models/{model_id} to retrieve full details for a video generation model by ID (aliases, timestamps, fingerprint, input/output modalities, ownership, version). Requires bearer auth; returns 200 with model object, 400 for bad request, 404 if not found.
